channel.title: FizzerX-Scape V1.0
channel.description:
Hey guys. This is my server that I have been coding for a little bit now. It is an Allstar Source (317). I am not here to advertise, I just want to show you my work so far. I am not even 50% done coding the server yet. Please don't hate, I'm not the best coder.
My plans with the server: I am planning on making Dragon Claws, Torva, etc. on this 317. I am going to make a webclient for this server. I am working on the Duel Arena. I want staking to work 100%
//WORKING ON: ::jail Working player PK scoreboard Dueling arena Holiday Events Random Events every hour
//FINISHED: NEW HOME NEW PKBOX NEW STAFF ZONE NEW PORTAL ZONE NEW CHILL ZONE 100% WORKING ::SUGGEST 100% WORKING REPORTING SYSTEM ADDED A BUNCH OF COMMANDS
-----------PICS------------ ---Links are PhotoBucket---- ---------------------------- New Home: [img]http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/newhome_zps5c67c075.png.html[/img] http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/newhome_zps5c67c075.png.html
Guilds: [img]http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/guilds_zps410a9092.png.html[/img] http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/guilds_zps410a9092.png.html
GS-Mini: [img]http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/gsmini_zps344958d0.png.html[/img] http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/gsmini_zps344958d0.png.html
Donator Zone: [img]http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/donator_zps34a83057.png.html[/img] http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/donator_zps34a83057.png.html
Dragon Lair: [img]http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/dl_zpsb3a7dd48.png.html[/img] http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/dl_zpsb3a7dd48.png.html
Chill Zone: [img]http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/chillzone_zpsc5279945.png.html[/img] http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/chillzone_zpsc5279945.png.html
Barrows: [img]http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/barrows_zpse648c652.png.html[/img] http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/barrows_zpse648c652.png.html
PKBox: [img]http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/pkbox_zpsecd4a455.png.html[/img] http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/pkbox_zpsecd4a455.png.html
Please show some love in the comments, let me know what you think!! -Mod Cody

item.title: FizzerX-Scape V1.0
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:2, topic:515971”]Your pictures are broken.
This thread will get more attention if you bring forward some information about your game. Some examples would be future plans, accomplishments, and a development log to allow us to track your progress.
Good luck.[/quote]

I was just about to modify the text and add what my plans are. How can I make my pictures work? I inserted my photobucket link of the pics in the “Insert Image” like [img] thing

Read full topic

item.title: FizzerX-Scape V1.0
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Your pictures are broken.
This thread will get more attention if you bring forward some information about your game. Some examples would be future plans, accomplishments, and a development log to allow us to track your progress.
Good luck.
